overview: Connor and Dominic reenact the retelling of one straight man's story of his first time getting it on with another man.  Aston is tasked with dressing Damien but one thing leads to the next and the only task completed is undressing a very horny and curious Damien.  Sean Duran and Jackson Traynor are up next with their reenactment of a hot straight guy gone gay story. What happens in the locker room stays in the locker room!
title: Confessions of a Straight Man
